item.g:title: Classic Royal Blue Long Sleeve Polo T-Shirt
item.g:description: Description: Stay stylish and comfortable with this Classic Royal Blue Long Sleeve Polo T-Shirt. Designed with a sleek collar and white piping detail, it blends casual elegance with everyday comfort. Made from premium cotton blend fabric, it offers a soft feel and breathability, perfect for all-day wear. Ideal for both casual outings and semi-formal occasions, this polo adds a refined touch to your wardrobe. Key Features: Color: Royal Blue Style: Long Sleeve Polo with Contrast Collar Lining Fabric: Soft and breathable cotton blend Fit: Regular Fit for all-day comfort Suitable for: Casual, Office, or Weekend Wear

item.g:title: Slim Fit Chinos
item.g:description: Product Description:Redefine smart casual dressing with these Slim Fit Chinos, crafted to deliver the perfect balance of comfort, style, and sophistication. Made from high-quality cotton with a hint of stretch, these chinos provide a soft feel and excellent flexibility for all-day wear. The slim fit design offers a modern, tailored silhouette that flatters every body type, while maintaining ease of movement. Designed with attention to detail, these chinos feature a clean, flat-front finish, side pockets, and back welt pockets for a sleek and functional look. Whether you’re dressing for the office, a weekend brunch, or an evening out, these versatile chinos pair effortlessly with shirts, polos, or casual tees. Key Features: Fit: Slim fit for a modern, tailored appearance Fabric: Premium cotton stretch blend for comfort and flexibility Design: Flat-front style with belt loops and functional pockets Comfort: Soft, breathable, and lightweight material for all-day wear Occasion: Perfect for work, travel, or casual outings Care: Easy to wash and maintain These Slim Fit Chinos are your go-to choice for an effortlessly sharp and refined everyday look.

item.g:title: Cotton Crew Neck Tee
item.g:description: Product Description: Experience ultimate comfort and effortless style with this Cotton Crew Neck Tee. Crafted from 100% premium cotton, it offers a soft, breathable feel that keeps you cool and comfortable all day long. The classic crew neck design and tailored fit make it a timeless wardrobe essential that pairs perfectly with jeans, shorts, or chinos.Designed for everyday wear, this versatile T-shirt combines simplicity with durability, making it ideal for layering or wearing on its own. Whether you're heading to the gym, running errands, or relaxing at home, this tee ensures a clean and polished look every time. Key Features: Fabric: 100% soft, breathable cotton Fit: Regular fit for all-day comfort Neckline: Classic crew neck design Style: Minimalist and versatile for any occasion Care: Easy to wash and maintain A must-have staple for every wardrobe — simple, stylish, and built for everyday comfort.

item.g:title: Cotton Crew Neck Tee
item.g:description: Product Details: Fabric: 100% premium cotton for a soft and breathable feel Fit: Regular fit offering all-day comfort and ease of movement Neckline: Classic crew neck for a timeless, casual look Sleeves: Short sleeves for a relaxed, everyday style Design: Minimalist solid design—easy to pair and layer Comfort: Lightweight, skin-friendly, and durable fabric Occasion: Ideal for casual wear, lounging, travel, or layering under jackets Care: Machine washable and easy to maintain A perfect blend of comfort and simplicity, this Cotton Crew Neck Tee is an essential addition to your everyday wardrobe.

item.g:title: The Exceutive Essential Set
item.g:description: Product Details: Premium Diary:A soft-bound notebook with smooth, high-quality pages — perfect for meetings, journaling, and daily notes. Personalization adds a polished, executive touch. Stainless Steel Temperature Bottle: Double-wall insulated to keep beverages hot or cold for hours. The sleek matte finish and engraved name elevate its premium feel. Coffee Mug: A durable and stylish mug that enhances your workspace or travel routine — perfect for coffee lovers. Stylish Pen: Elegant metallic pen offering a smooth writing experience, ideal for professional use or gifting. Keychain: Compact, durable, and customizable — a daily essential that pairs practicality with personal style. Why You’ll Love It: Premium, professional, and thoughtful gifting solution Elegant packaging ideal for festive or corporate occasions Customizable with name or company branding Useful, everyday accessories for office or travel Affordable yet luxurious presentation Perfect For: Corporate & Employee Gifting , Business Clients & Partners, Students & Professionals,Festive Gifts (Diwali, New Year, etc.), Personal or Return Gifts. Bring elegance, functionality, and a personal touch together with “The Executive Essentials Set” — the perfect way to express appreciation, professionalism, and class.

item.g:title: Smiley Star of the Week Badges
item.g:description: Celebrate achievements and encourage positive behavior with the Star of the Week Badges, a fun and engaging way to recognize effort, good conduct, or exceptional performance. Designed for schools, offices, clubs, and events, these badges add a cheerful touch while motivating students, employees, or participants to strive for excellence. Crafted from durable, high-quality materials, the badges are built to last and can be reused multiple times, making them a practical choice for ongoing reward programs. The bright and vibrant smiley design instantly draws attention and spreads positivity, while the easy-to-use safety pin clasp ensures they can be securely attached to uniforms, shirts, bags, or lanyards without causing damage. Whether you’re a teacher recognizing outstanding students, a manager appreciating team performance, or an event organizer highlighting achievements, these badges make every “star” feel valued and proud. Key Features: Design: Colorful and cheerful smiley motif for instant appeal Attachment: Simple safety clasp for easy pinning Durability: Strong and reusable for long-term use Ideal For: Schools, teachers, student reward programs, office recognition, or event giveaways Make recognition fun and memorable with the Star of the Week Badges, helping individuals shine while boosting confidence and motivation.

item.g:title: BlueTote Everyday Sling
item.g:description: Stay stylish and organized on the go with the BlueTote Everyday Sling. Crafted from premium-quality denim in a timeless jean blue shade, this lightweight and durable crossbody bag is perfect for daily use. Its spacious main compartment easily fits your phone, wallet, keys, and other essentials, while the secure flap closure keeps them safe. The adjustable shoulder strap ensures a comfortable fit, and its versatile design pairs effortlessly with both casual and semi-formal outfits. Whether you’re heading to college, work, shopping, or traveling, the BlueTote Everyday Sling is the perfect companion to keep your style chic and your essentials close at hand. Product Details: Material: Premium-quality denim fabric Color: Jean Blue Type: Crossbody Sling / Satchel Bag Closure Type: Flap with secure lock Strap: Adjustable shoulder strap Compartments: 1 main compartment + inner pockets Usage: Ideal for college, office, travel, shopping, or daily outings Care Instructions: Wipe gently with a damp cloth; do not machine wash

item.g:title: NY Heritage Cap
item.g:description: Celebrate timeless urban style with the NY Heritage Cap, designed to combine classic streetwear aesthetics with everyday comfort. Made from premium high-quality cotton, this cap is lightweight, breathable, and soft, ensuring all-day comfort for casual outings, sports, or travel. The front showcases an iconic embroidered “NY” logo, reflecting the heritage and energy of New York City, while the curved brim adds a sporty, classic touch and provides effective sun protection. Featuring an adjustable strap at the back, this cap delivers a customized and secure fit for all head sizes. The durable construction ensures long-lasting shape and style, making it a reliable accessory for daily wear. Perfect for: Everyday casual wear: Elevate your streetwear look effortlessly Outdoor activities: Lightweight and breathable for comfort during sports or travel Fashion statements: Adds a stylish, urban edge to any outfit Key Features: Material: 100% premium cotton for comfort and durability Logo: High-quality embroidered “NY” for a bold, classic design Brim: Curved to protect from sunlight while maintaining sporty style Adjustable strap: Ensures a perfect fit for all head sizes Care: Easy to clean; retains shape and embroidery with gentle washing With its heritage-inspired design, versatile style, and quality craftsmanship, the NY Heritage Cap is a must-have accessory for those who want to carry the spirit of New York wherever they go.

item.g:title: The Heritage Tea Box
item.g:description: The Heritage Tea Box is a luxury gift set from the brand Advait Living, which features 24-carat gold detailing on its handcrafted drinkware. Contents of the Gift Box The box contains a blend of artisanal items and natural, healthy food products: Neer Sadabahaar Glasses (Set of Two): Clear glass tumblers. Inspired by the Periwinkle (sadabahaar) flower. Feature intricate artwork with 24-carat gold work that is screen-printed and applied by hand. They stand 5.5 inches tall with a 2.5-inch diameter and have an approximate capacity of 375 ml. Brass Plated Spoons (Set of Two): 15 cm long, brass-plated spoons. Handcrafted by skilled artisans. Moringa Sattu Mix (120 gms): A healthy drink powder and "natural protein" source for an instant energy boost. A nutrient-dense blend of Moringa, Chana Sattu (Bengal gram), Roasted Yellow Pea, Turmeric, and Cardamom. It is described as a nutritional powerhouse with plant protein and all nine essential amino acids. Ethical Raw Monofloral Honey (220 gms): Sourced ethically and is 100% pure and natural. Collected from single-flower farms in regions like Rajasthan and Gujarat. It is completely free of sweetening additives and preservatives. The overall presentation is designed for premium and luxury gifting, suitable for various occasions such as corporate gifts, weddings, or birthdays. The contents promote health and wellness while blending traditional craftsmanship with modern elegance.

item.g:title: Cocktail Hour
item.g:description: Raise a toast to elegance and style with the Cocktail Hour Gift Set, a luxurious collection designed to make every celebration truly unforgettable. Thoughtfully curated for cocktail enthusiasts and connoisseurs, this set brings together timeless craftsmanship and modern sophistication. Each piece in the collection is beautifully handcrafted with a refined brass finish, adding a touch of vintage charm to any home bar. The set includes essential bar tools — a corkscrew, strainer, bottle opener, and stirrer — ensuring a complete and seamless bartending experience. To elevate every drink, the gift box also features a set of whiskey rocks, perfect for chilling beverages without diluting their rich flavors. Elegantly arranged in a premium presentation box, this set makes an impressive gift choice for birthdays, anniversaries, festive occasions, corporate events, or client appreciation. Whether for a casual evening or a grand celebration, the Cocktail Hour Gift Set adds class, craftsmanship, and sophistication to every pour.

item.g:title: SustainElite Corporate Hamper
item.g:description: Bring sophistication and sustainability together with this Premium Corporate Gift Set, perfect for professionals, clients, and employees. Thoughtfully curated, it includes a selection of elegant, eco-friendly essentials designed to promote wellness and productivity. Product Features: Eco Bottle with Bamboo Lid: Stylish and reusable glass bottle with a natural bamboo cap — perfect for hydration on the go. Wooden Perpetual Calendar: A beautifully crafted desk calendar that adds a rustic charm to any workspace. Premium Tea/Coffee Jar: A sealed jar of rich, aromatic tea or coffee blend for daily refreshment. Bamboo Pen & Case Set: Sleek bamboo pen and case — a sustainable and elegant writing companion. Minimalist Gift Box: All items are neatly arranged in a durable, eco-friendly box suitable for gifting. Ideal For: Corporate gifting, employee appreciation, festive gifting, client giveaways, or business events.

item.g:title: Floral Print Personalized Leather Diary
item.g:description: The Floral Print Personalized Leather Diary is a perfect blend of elegance, creativity, and functionality — designed for those who appreciate style in every detail. Crafted from premium-quality leatherette, this diary features a beautiful floral print cover that adds a touch of charm and sophistication to your daily routine. Its smooth, high-quality pages make writing, journaling, or planning a delightful experience, while the personalized name or logo engraving adds a unique and thoughtful touch. Ideal for corporate gifting, personal use, or special occasions, this diary perfectly balances practicality with aesthetics. The durable leather cover protects your notes, and the vibrant floral design brings positivity and inspiration to your workspace or study. Key Features: Elegant floral print leather cover for a stylish and modern look High-quality paper suitable for writing, sketching, or note-taking Personalization available – add your name, initials, or company logo Perfect for gifting to employees, clients, students, or loved ones Available in multiple colors and sizes (A5/A6) Whether for daily journaling, business meetings, or personal reflections, the Floral Print Personalized Leather Diary makes every note a little more special — a thoughtful keepsake that beautifully combines luxury and personality.

item.g:title: Success Achieved New Year Gift Set
item.g:description: Celebrate new beginnings with this thoughtful and inspiring New Year Gift Set — perfect for employees, clients, and loved ones. Designed to spread positivity and motivation, this elegant combo makes a memorable start to the year. Includes: Premium notebook or diary for planning success in 2025 Stylish keychain for everyday use Delicious chocolate bar for a sweet start to the year Motivational greeting card with “Something New Every Day” message Compact gift box with festive New Year tag Highlights: Elegant packaging suitable for corporate and personal gifting Ideal for New Year celebrations, employee appreciation, or client gifts Thoughtfully curated to inspire productivity and joy

item.g:title: Professional Panache - Personalized Work Essentials Pen Set
item.g:description: The Professional Panache – Personalized Work Essentials Pen Set is a timeless blend of elegance, precision, and functionality — crafted for professionals who appreciate the art of fine writing. Designed with a sleek, ergonomic body and a premium metallic finish, this pen set reflects sophistication and confidence in every detail. Its smooth ink flow ensures a seamless writing experience, making it perfect for daily office use, note-taking, signing documents, or personal journaling.Each pen in this set embodies quality and refinement, making it a perfect choice for corporate gifting, client appreciation, employee recognition, or executive use. The set can be personalized with individual names, company logos, or initials, adding an exclusive and memorable touch that enhances brand value and connection. Key Features: Premium Design: Elegant metallic body with a balanced grip for comfortable and refined writing. Smooth Ink Flow: High-quality refill for effortless, smudge-free writing. Personalization Options: Custom engraving of names or logos for a unique, branded touch. Elegant Packaging: Presented in a stylish gift box, ready for corporate or personal gifting. Versatile Use: Ideal for professionals, executives, clients, or stationery enthusiasts. Whether used in the office or presented as a thoughtful gift, the Professional Panache Pen Set symbolizes success, sophistication, and professionalism — making it a lasting accessory that stands out on any desk.

item.g:title: Premium Blue Dry Fruit Gift Box
item.g:description: The Pink Dry Fruit Gift Box is a luxurious and thoughtful gift, carefully curated to combine health, taste, and elegance. This delightful assortment includes premium almonds, cashews, pistachios, walnuts, and other high-quality dry fruits, each selected for freshness, flavor, and nutritional value. Every bite is a perfect blend of crunch, richness, and wholesome goodness, making it a treat that everyone will appreciate. Housed in a vibrant pink gift box, the presentation is as stunning as the contents, making it an ideal choice for Diwali gifting, corporate events, client appreciation, employee recognition, or personal celebrations. The colorful and classy packaging reflects thoughtfulness and care, ensuring your loved ones, colleagues, or clients feel truly valued. Key Features: Premium selection of almonds, cashews, pistachios, walnuts, and more Fresh, high-quality, and nutrient-rich dry fruits Elegant pink gift box for a visually stunning presentation Perfect for festive gifting, corporate gifting, and special occasions Demonstrates care, appreciation, and thoughtfulness This gift box is more than just a treat — it’s a symbol of health, love, and celebration, making it a memorable and cherished gesture for anyone who receives it.

item.g:title: Personalized Desk Organizer with Calendar, Clock, and Pen
item.g:description: This Personalized Desk Organizer with Calendar, Clock, and Pen is the perfect addition to any office or study space. Designed for both functionality and style, it features a sleek, black finish with gold accents that add a touch of elegance to your workspace. Key features include: Customizable Name: The organizer can be personalized with your name on the built-in calendar and pen, making it a unique and thoughtful gift. Multi-Function Design: The organizer includes a section for pens and markers, a built-in clock, and a calendar to keep track of the date, all in one compact unit. Phone Stand: A designated slot to hold your phone ensures easy access to calls, messages, or notifications without cluttering your desk. Durable Materials: Made with high-quality materials, the desk organizer is sturdy and built to last, keeping your essentials organized and accessible. Perfect for keeping your workspace neat and personalized, this organizer also serves as a practical gift for friends, family, or coworkers!

item.g:title: Vacuum Flask Set with Bottles and Cups
item.g:description: A vacuum flask set with bottles and cups is a versatile and practical collection designed for keeping beverages at the desired temperature while on-the-go or at home. Here's a detailed description: Features: Vacuum Insulation: Double-walled or triple-walled insulation technology that keeps drinks hot or cold for an extended period. Stainless Steel or BPA-Free Material: Durable, non-toxic, and odor-resistant materials ensure safe consumption. Leak-Proof Design: Secure lids or caps prevent spills and leaks. Bottles and Cups: Multiple containers for storing and serving different beverages. This set is perfect for anyone looking for a reliable and eco-friendly way to enjoy their favorite beverages on-the-go or at home.

item.g:title: Portable Blenders
item.g:description: Blend your favorite smoothies, shakes, and juices anytime, anywhere with our Portable Rechargeable Mini Blender in a chic pink design. This compact and lightweight blender is perfect for travel, gym, office, or home use — offering convenience and style in one powerful device.Designed with a durable transparent blending jar and stainless-steel blades, it ensures smooth blending of fruits, vegetables, and ice within seconds. The one-touch control button makes operation simple — just double-tap to start blending and enjoy a fresh, healthy drink instantly. Equipped with a rechargeable USB battery, this blender can be easily powered through a laptop, power bank, or adapter, ensuring you never miss your daily dose of nutrition. The leak-proof lid and carrying strap make it portable and safe for use on the go. Key Features: Stylish pink color with ergonomic design Rechargeable via USB (cable included) Powerful stainless-steel blades for efficient blending One-touch operation with LED indicator Portable, lightweight, and leak-proof Perfect for smoothies, shakes, protein drinks, and baby food Usage: Just add fruits, milk, or water into the container, tighten the lid, and press the button — your healthy drink is ready in seconds!

Smoor Caramel Crisps (80 gm): Gourmet caramel-coated crisps for a delightful sweet crunch. Artisanal Darjeeling Green Tea: Premium-quality green tea offering a refreshing and aromatic brew. The Giftara Tilak Set: Includes roli, rice, mishri, and chandan — perfect for completing traditional rituals. Golden Gota Patti Embellished Top-Bottom Box (10 × 7.5 × 3.5 inches): Luxurious, handcrafted gift box featuring intricate gota patti detailing, enhancing the overall festive appeal.

item.g:title: Eco-Friendly Cork Notebook & Wooden Pen Gift Set
item.g:description: A stylish and sustainable stationery set that includes a cork-covered notebook and a wooden ballpoint pen, presented in a kraft paper gift box. The notebook features an elastic closure band to keep notes secure, while the pen has a smooth writing tip and a natural bamboo finish. Perfect for eco-conscious professionals, students, or as a corporate giveaway. Features: Material: Cork cover notebook, bamboo pen, kraft box Eco-friendly and reusable Compact and elegant design Ideal for gifting, office, or personal use

item.g:title: Premium Black Corporate Gift Set
item.g:description: Make a lasting impression with this sophisticated 4-in-1 corporate gift set designed for professionals who value style and utility. Set Includes: Premium Leather Notebook – Sleek and durable, perfect for meetings or journaling. Metal Card Holder – Keep business cards organized in a refined, compact design. Stylish Metal Pen – Smooth writing experience with a touch of luxury. Leather Keychain – Elegant and sturdy, completing the coordinated set. Ideal for corporate gifting, employee recognition, client appreciation, or festive giveaways, this classy black set blends elegance with everyday practicality. Price: Starting from ₹400 (custom branding available)

item.g:title: Elegant Pen & Keychain Gift Set
item.g:description: This premium Pen & Keychain Gift Set is a perfect blend of style, utility, and sophistication — an ideal choice for professionals and corporate gifting. The luxury pen features a smooth matte black finish with metallic gold accents, offering a comfortable grip and seamless writing experience. Its elegant design reflects class and professionalism, making it suitable for office, meetings, or gifting purposes. The accompanying metal keychain is designed with a sleek rectangular frame and a durable loop, ensuring both style and practicality. Crafted from high-quality materials, it pairs perfectly with the pen, creating a coordinated and refined look. Presented in a premium black textured box, this set exudes elegance and thoughtfulness, making it a great option for corporate events, festive gifting, employee recognition, or client appreciation. Price: Starting from ₹250Customization: Company logo or name can be engraved on both items for personalized branding.

item.g:title: Premium Cork Wallet & Keychain Gift Set
item.g:description: Add a touch of natural elegance to your everyday essentials with this Premium Cork Wallet & Keychain Gift Set. Crafted from eco-friendly cork material, this set combines sustainability with style. The wallet features multiple card slots and a spacious compartment for cash, offering both functionality and sophistication. The matching keychain comes with a sleek metal ring and can be customized with your logo, making it a perfect choice for corporate gifting or personal use. Key Features: Material: High-quality natural cork & PU leather interior Eco-friendly and durable Wallet with multiple card slots and cash compartments Matching cork keychain with customizable branding option Packed in an elegant black gift box Ideal for corporate gifts, giveaways, or personal use Dimensions: Wallet: 11 cm x 9 cm Keychain: 8 cm x 4 cm Available Colors: Natural Cork Brown

item.g:title: Lucky Electric Mug with Smart Warmer Plate
item.g:description: The Lucky Electric Mug with Smart Warmer Plate is designed to keep your beverages warm and enjoyable for longer. Crafted from premium ceramic, this elegant mug comes with a matching lid and spoon, ensuring a complete and convenient experience. The smart warmer plate features advanced temperature control technology that maintains your drink at an optimal temperature without overheating. Perfect for home, office, or gifting, this mug combines style, comfort, and innovation — making it a must-have for every coffee or tea lover. Product Details: Material: High-quality ceramic mug with electronic warmer plate Capacity: 350 ml Color: White with gold “Lucky” print Power: 16W Voltage: 220V Temperature Maintenance: Keeps beverages warm up to 55°C In the Box: 1 Ceramic Mug, 1 Lid, 1 Spoon, 1 Electric Warmer Plate Special Features: Smart constant temperature heating Easy to clean and durable Elegant gift-ready packaging Ideal For: Home, office, or as a premium gift item

item.g:title: Eco-Friendly Cork Hardcover Notebook
item.g:description: Product Details: Material: Natural cork cover with premium paper pages Size: A5 (Approx. 21 x 14.8 cm) Pages: 160 ruled pages (80 GSM) Color: Natural cork brown with black elastic band Closure Type: Elastic strap for secure binding Bookmark: Attached ribbon marker Paper Type: Lined (ruled) paper for smooth writing Eco-Friendly Feature: Made from sustainable cork material Ideal For: Office, school, journaling, and corporate gifting Packaging: Elegant eco-friendly wrap, suitable for gifting

item.g:title: Premium Stainless Steel Water Bottle
item.g:description: Product Description: This fashionable stainless steel water bottle combines durability, style, and functionality. Made from high-quality food-grade stainless steel, it keeps your beverages hot or cold for up to 20 hours. With a sleek matte finish and compact design, it fits perfectly in your bag or car holder. Ideal for office, gym, travel, or outdoor activities, this bottle ensures that you always have fresh water or your favorite drink at the right temperature. Product Features: Material: Premium stainless steel (food-grade, rust-proof) Capacity: 500 ml (approx.) Insulation: Double-walled vacuum insulation (keeps liquids hot/cold up to 20 hours) Design: Elegant silver finish with a sturdy leak-proof lid Lid Type: Screw cap with attached carrying loop for easy portability Eco-friendly: Reusable and BPA-free Usage: Suitable for water, coffee, tea, juice, etc.

item.g:title: Premium Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle
item.g:description: Keep your drinks at the perfect temperature all day with this double-wall, vacuum-insulated stainless steel bottle. It keeps beverages icy cold for up to 24 hours or piping hot for up to 12 hours. The wide-mouth design makes filling, pouring, and cleaning effortless, while the leak-proof lid ensures worry-free portability.Made from food-grade stainless steel, this bottle is 30% lighter yet stronger than ever, making it ideal for the gym, office, travel, or outdoor adventures. Its sleek matte finish adds a modern, stylish touch to your daily hydration. Key Features: Material: Premium stainless steel (food-grade, BPA-free) Insulation: Double-wall vacuum insulation Temperature Retention: Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours, hot for 12 hours Design: Wide mouth for easy cleaning and adding ice cubes Durability: 30% lighter and extra-tough construction Capacity: Approx. 500 ml Leak-Proof: Secure screw cap prevents leakage Eco-Friendly: Reusable and sustainable choice Ideal For: Daily use, travel, office, gym, hiking, and outdoor adventures.

item.g:title: Elegant Stainless Steel Water Bottle
item.g:description: Key Features: Material: High-quality, food-grade stainless steel Finish: Smooth matte white exterior Insulation: Double-wall insulation for temperature retention Capacity: Approx. 500 ml Lid Type: Secure, leak-proof screw cap Portable: Slim design fits easily in bags and car holders Eco-Friendly: BPA-free, reusable, and sustainable Ideal For: Daily hydration, gym workouts, office desks, school use, and outdoor adventures.

item.g:title: Stainless Steel Thermal Flask
item.g:description: Product Description: This premium stainless steel thermal flask is designed to keep your beverages hot or cold for extended hours. With a double-wall vacuum insulation, it maintains the temperature of coffee, tea, or water for up to 12 hours. The sleek brushed steel finish gives it a modern and professional look, ideal for both office and home use. Features: Capacity: Approx. 1 liter Material: High-grade stainless steel body with a durable plastic lid and handle Insulation: Double-wall vacuum for temperature retention Design: Spill-proof spout with easy-pour mechanism Usage: Suitable for coffee, tea, or hot water

item.g:title: Matte Black Thermal Coffee Carafe
item.g:description: The Matte Black Thermal Coffee Carafe blends modern elegance with exceptional temperature retention. Built with a durable double-wall vacuum-insulated stainless steel body, it maintains your beverages’ ideal temperature—hot or cold—for up to 12 hours. The sleek matte black exterior lends a sophisticated, contemporary look, perfect for home, office meetings, or cafe settings. Key Features: Capacity: Approx. 1 liter Material: Stainless steel interior with matte black exterior finish Insulation: Double-wall vacuum for temperature retention Design: Sleek handle and easy-pour spout for spill-free serving Ideal for: Coffee, tea, or any hot/cold beverage Care: Easy to clean and highly durable

item.g:title: Electric Kettle – Stainless Steel with White Finish
item.g:description: Product Description: The Electric Kettle with Stainless Steel Interior is a stylish and efficient appliance designed for quick water boiling. Its sleek white body with chrome detailing gives it a premium and modern look, perfect for both home and office use. With fast heating technology, it can boil water in just a few minutes, making it ideal for tea, coffee, and instant meals. Key Features: Capacity: 1.5 liters (approx.) Material: Stainless steel interior with a durable white outer body Heating Element: Concealed for easy cleaning and safety Auto Shut-Off: Prevents overheating and dry boiling 360° Swivel Base: Convenient for left and right-hand use Indicator Light: Shows when the kettle is heating

item.g:title: Sleek Stainless Steel Water Bottle
item.g:description: Product Description: Stay hydrated in style with this premium stainless steel water bottle, designed for both elegance and functionality. Crafted from high-quality, rust-resistant steel, it keeps your beverages hot for up to 12 hours and cold for up to 24 hours. The leak-proof, screw-top lid ensures no spills, making it ideal for travel, office, gym, or outdoor use. Its sleek, glossy finish gives a modern and professional look, while the lightweight and durable body makes it easy to carry wherever you go. Perfect for both men and women, this eco-friendly alternative to plastic bottles combines style, sustainability, and convenience in one. Features: Double-wall insulation for temperature retention 100% leak-proof and BPA-free Premium stainless steel body Easy to clean and reusable Ideal for gifting, travel, and everyday use

item.g:title: White Rhino Stainless Steel Electric Kettle
item.g:description: Detailed Features: 1. Premium Build Quality Crafted from high-grade stainless steel, the kettle offers superior durability and corrosion resistance. Its polished mirror finish gives it a modern, elegant look that complements any kitchen decor while ensuring long-lasting shine and easy cleaning. 2. Fast Boil Technology Equipped with a powerful 1500-watt concealed heating element, it rapidly boils water in just a few minutes—ideal for preparing tea, coffee, instant noodles, soups, or oatmeal without waiting long. 3. Generous Capacity With a 1.7-liter capacity, it provides enough hot water for multiple cups at once—perfect for families, offices, or gatherings. The visible water level indicator helps measure the exact amount needed, minimizing waste. 4. Safety First Designed with automatic shut-off and boil-dry protection, the kettle turns off immediately after reaching boiling point or when it detects no water inside, ensuring maximum user safety and preventing damage. 5. Convenient & User-Friendly Design The 360° cordless rotational base allows you to lift and place the kettle from any direction—perfect for both left- and right-handed users. The ergonomic handle ensures a secure and comfortable grip, even when the kettle is full. 6. Power Indicator Light A subtle red indicator light at the base clearly shows when the kettle is powered on, adding to user convenience and safety. 7. Easy Cleaning & Maintenance The wide-mouth design and removable lid make filling and cleaning effortless. The stainless steel interior prevents odor buildup and maintains the natural taste of your water or beverages. 8. Energy Efficient With its fast-boil system and auto shut-off feature, the kettle consumes less power compared to traditional stovetop methods, making it an energy-efficient and eco-friendly choice.
